txt.en: In celebration of your participation in Midsummer, Feredis in Minas Tirith has made even more unique, seasonal items available to you! Feredis can also be found in Furtherholm.
Complete Midsummer quests in Minas Tirith, Furtherholm, and across Middle-earth to unlock even more unique seasonal rewards.
Complete Midsummer quests in Minas Tirith, Furtherholm, and across Middle-earth
Complete Midsummer quests in Minas Tirith, Furtherholm, and across Middle-earth to unlock the ability to purchase additional seasonal rewards from Feredis.
